Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

Funeral March in Memory of Richard Nordraak, EG 107

1866

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Grieg later made arrangements of the march for military band and for orchestra; the orchestral version is lost.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/2 · Andre originalkomposisjoner · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Könemann · K 267 · Sonata and Piano Pieces · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100c · Piano Works / III / Arrangements of Own Works

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
